Subject: Error Updating the Latest security patch upgrade ADV-2025-001
Description: Hi SUpport, We recently received an advisory ADV-2025-001 to update our server and tried running an live update. However, We are receiving an error " An error occured. Hash does not match" at the time of the update. Kindly help us resolve this.
What_We_Know__c: Customer's firewall was blocking traffic between EPP Server and our liveupdate server. We found this after testing for communication from the EPP Server's backend.
Solution_Comment__c: Issue was resolved after the customer configured their firewall with the necessary allow rules.
